title: Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) 

Press 'Add' in the associated editors section. 

a. Multiple selection could be enabled. 

b. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives). 

NOTES: KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)

Also: 

f. There is a need for a width hint for the dialog. 

g. The File editors Preferences page grows in height when selected, but no other pages do the same. 

I have already implemented fixes for a, c, and f. 

Need to release. 

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)

Released fixes for a, c, f, and g.
OB: Pressing 'Add' adds a hidden entry in the associated editors list.
EB: The 'Add' button should not add a hidden entry in the associated editors list.
SR:
1. Open the Editor Selection Dialog.
2. Go to the associated editors section. 
3. Press the 'Add' button.
4. Verify that no hidden entry is added in the associated editors list.
